mapper.insert:
insert all into NOTICE( notice_No, notice_Subject, notice_Mid, notice_ReportingDate, notice_PostType, notice_PostStartDate, notice_PostEndDate, notice_Type, notice_Hit, notice_Doc ) values( seq_notice_No.nextval, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeMid}, SYSDATE, #{noticePostType}, #{noticePostStartDate}, #{noticePostEndDate}, #{noticeType}, 0, #{noticeDoc} )
into notice_files( notice_files_no, notice_no, file_sysfile, file_orifile ) values( seq_notice_files_no.nextval, seq_notice_no.currval, #{att.sysFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att.oriFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: select notice_no, notice_subject, notice_mid, to_char(notice_reportingdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as notice_reportingdate, notice_postType, notice_postStartDate, notice_postEndDate, notice_type, notice_hit, notice_doc from NOTICE order by notice_type desc

select notice_no, notice_subject, notice_mid, to_char(notice_reportingdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as notice_reportingdate, notice_postType, notice_postStartDate, notice_postEndDate, notice_type, notice_hit, notice_doc from NOTICE where notice_no = #{_parameter}
select notice_files_no, notice_no, file_sysfile, file_orifile from notice_files where notice_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: update NOTICE set notice_subject = #{noticeSubject}, notice_reportingdate = #{noticeReportingDate}, notice_postType = #{noticePostType}, notice_postStartDate = #{noticePostStartDate}, notice_postEndDate = #{noticePostEndDate}, notice_type = #{noticeType}, notice_doc = #{noticeDoc} where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
update NOTICE set notice_type = '일반공지' where notice_postEndDate < SYSDATE and notice_type = '중요공지'
